languages.text: При вашем приближении осколки чудовищной конструкции издают едва слышный звон.
As you approach, the shards of the monstrous structure make a barely audible ringing sound.
languages.original_text: При вашем приближении осколки чудовищной конструкции издают едва слышный звон.

traits.locale_text: As you approach, the shards of the monstrous structure make a barely audible ringing sound.
As you approach, the shards of the monstrous structure make a barely audible ringing sound.
As you approach, the shards of the monstrous structure make a barely audible ringing sound.
As you approach, the shards of the monstrous structure make a barely audible ringing sound.
As you approach, the shards of the monstrous structure make a barely audible ringing sound.

languages.text: Als du dich näherst, verursachen die Splitter der monströsen Struktur ein kaum hörbares Läuten.
languages.original_text: As you approach, the shards of the monstrous structure make a barely audible ringing sound.

traits.locale_text: Als du dich näherst, verursachen die Splitter der monströsen Struktur ein kaum hörbares Läuten.

languages.text: À votre approche, les fragments de la structure monstrueuse émettent un sifflement à peine audible.
languages.original_text: As you approach, the shards of the monstrous structure make a barely audible ringing sound.

traits.locale_text: À votre approche, les fragments de la structure monstrueuse émettent un sifflement à peine audible.

languages.text: 当你靠近这座巨型造物时，它的碎片发出了几不可闻的声音。
languages.original_text: As you approach, the shards of the monstrous structure make a barely audible ringing sound.

traits.locale_text: 当你靠近这座巨型造物时，它的碎片发出了几不可闻的声音。

languages.text: Cuando te acercas, los fragmentos de la monstruosa estructura emiten un pitido apenas audible.
languages.original_text: As you approach, the shards of the monstrous structure make a barely audible ringing sound.

traits.locale_text: Cuando te acercas, los fragmentos de la monstruosa estructura emiten un pitido apenas audible.

languages.text: 近づくと、巨大な建造物の破片がかすかに響くような鈴の音を立てていた。
languages.original_text: As you approach, the shards of the monstrous structure make a barely audible ringing sound.

traits.locale_text: 近づくと、巨大な建造物の破片がかすかに響くような鈴の音を立てていた。

languages.text: Yaklaştıkça devasa yapının parçalarından zar zor duyulan, hafif bir çınlama sesi geliyor.
languages.original_text: As you approach, the shards of the monstrous structure make a barely audible ringing sound.

traits.locale_text: Yaklaştıkça, devasa yapının parçalarından zar zor duyulan, hafif bir çınlama sesi gelir.
